p: Ursolic acid has been reported to inhibit viral infections of herpes simplex virus (HSV)‐1 and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), as well as tumor growth (Nonotny, Vachalkova, & Biggs, 2001). Extracts and selected purified components of OB showed a broad spectrum of anti‐DNA and RNA virus activities also. Three phytochemical compounds of tulsi, namely, vicenin, sorientin 4'‐O‐glucoside 2”‐O‐p‐hydroxy‐benzoagte, and ursolic acid showed inhibition of main protease of SARS‐CoV‐2 in a molecular docking study (Shree et al., 2020).
